articles.description: However, on a month-on-month basis, IEX registered a 9 per cent growth in August. In July 2021, the total power trade volume was 7,151 MU. The total trade volume of 7,805 MU in August, 2022, comprised 6,517 MU in the conventional power market, 437 MU in the G…
articles.content:
The total trade volume of (IEX) registered an 18 per cent annual decline in August to 7,805 MU (million units). The total trade volume in August 2021 was at 9,538 MU, an IEX statement said.

articles.description: Ashneer Grover tweeted on Monday, "If UPI is the best tech/regulatory innovation in the world, the RBI’s digital lending guidelines have to be the worst."
articles.content:
Ashneer Grover on Monday slammed RBI's digital lending guidelines and called it one of the worst in the world for discouraging fintech firms from lending.
